data.name: Teledomica XR Viewer
data.description:
-------------- VISIT, SEE IT, PLACE IT ----------

Welcome to Teledomica XR Viewer, a new mixed-reality viewer dedicated to showcasing 3D models. 

- Visit interesting collections of 3D models
- Upload your own 3D Models 
- Interact with 3D models using your hands
- Grab, move, rotate models
- Inspect details
- See them on different scales
- Animate 
- Place them in your room with passthrough mode 
- Arrange multiple models in one scene
- Get featured on Daily Snacks with your creations

Come inside and explore our immersive collection of  3D models! 
We have curated diverse models, from a giant scorpion to medieval helmets, a swimming dolphin, and a modern armchair. 

With our interactive experience, you can grab and manipulate each model, inspecting every intricate detail up close. 

And, with our passthrough mode, you can even place these models in your room and bring them to life in your own space!

Were you looking for something beyond our collections? Why not consider uploading your models? 

In Teledomica, you can easily upload your creations and see them on your Quest device instantly.

Visit www.teledomica.com to learn more!
